title: romeitaly
author: romeitaly
content: Description: Banksy Walled Off Hotel Box SetStarting bid: $2000Buy it now: $4000End date and time: June 3 2022 12:00 AM UTCPayment methods accepted: BTC ETH LTC SOL PaypalAdditional information: Pictures : https://imgur.com/a/ILPvs5fPayment first, if I don't ship the art within 3 days. I'll refund you and you can report my accountWill contact highest bidder for transaction through PM

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: romeitaly on May 27, 2022, 01:08:55 PMDescription: Banksy Walled Off Hotel Box SetStarting bid: $2000Buy it now: $4000End date and time: June 3 2022 12:00 AM UTCPayment methods accepted: BTC ETH LTC SOL PaypalAdditional information: Pictures : https://imgur.com/a/ILPvs5fPayment first, if I don't ship the art within 3 days. I'll refund you and you can report my accountWill contact highest bidder for transaction through PMReport your account? That does nothing here if you were not yet aware... Will you accept escrow? Where are you shipping this from? Very cool but this is too easy to get scammed on without a trusted forum escrow to ensure all parties are happy.

comments.author: agentF
comments.body: Im willing to pay $4K only we use reputable ESCROW and i check the legitimacy of the art.

comments.author: romeitaly
comments.body: Quote from: agentF on August 15, 2022, 08:48:18 AMIm willing to pay $4K only we use reputable ESCROW and i check the legitimacy of the art. Hey! I've messaged you and yes we can do escrow and you can check the legitimacy of the art.

comments.author: romeitaly
comments.body: Still available for offer/bid. We can use escrow and buyer pays for shipping.
